verses.verse: Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were summoned, <S%H6817><s%> and they crossed <S%H5674><s%> to Zaphon <S%H6829><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> did you cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> calling <S%H7121><s%> us to go <S%H1980><s%> with you? We will burn <S%H8313><s%> your house <S%H1004><s%> down on you."

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I and my people <S%H5971><s%> were at great <S%H3966><s%> strife <S%H7379><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%> when I called <S%H2199><s%> you, you did not deliver <S%H3467><s%> me from their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"And when I saw <S%H7200><s%> that you would not deliver <S%H3467><s%> [me,] I took <S%H7760><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%> and crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand. <S%H3027><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> then have you come <S%H5927><s%> up to me this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against me?"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> defeated <S%H5221><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> "You are fugitives <S%H6412><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> O Gileadites, <S%H1568><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> [and] in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"

And the Gileadites <S%H1568><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> the fords <S%H9278><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> opposite Ephraim. <S%H669><s%> And it happened <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> [any of] the fugitives <S%H6412><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let me cross <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%>" the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> would say <S%H559><s%> to him, "Are you an Ephraimite <S%H673><s%>?" If he said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H3808><s%>"

then they would say <S%H559><s%> to him, "Say <S%H559><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> 'Shibboleth. <S%H9578><s%>'" But he said, <S%H559><s%> "Sibboleth, <S%H5451><s%>" for he could <S%H3559><s%> not pronounce <S%H1696><s%> it correctly. <S%H3651><s%> Then they seized <S%H270><s%> him and slew <S%H7819><s%> him at the fords <S%H9278><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> Thus there fell <S%H5307><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> 42000 of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in [one of] the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
Now Ibzan <S%H78><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And he had <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> [whom] he gave <S%H7971><s%> in marriage outside <S%H2351><s%> [the family,] and he brought <S%H935><s%> in thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> from outside <S%H2351><s%> for his sons. <S%H1121><s%> And he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Then Ibzan <S%H78><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

Now Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulunite <S%H2075><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him; and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Then Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulunite <S%H2075><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> at Aijalon <S%H357><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
Now Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And he had <S%H1961><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> grandsons <S%H1121><s%> who rode <S%H7392><s%> on seventy <S%H7657><s%> donkeys; <S%H5895><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Then Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> at Pirathon <S%H6552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of the Amalekites. <S%H6003><s%>
